question: I read two papers called Chain of Ideas and Nova, and they both involve the evaluation of the characteristics of ideas, such as quality, novelty, and so on. I want to know the specific measurement aspects of these two papers.
answer_format: Your answer should be a brief text.

eval_kwargs.reference_answer: The Chain of Ideas paper evaluates the novelty, significance, clarity, feasibility, and expected effectiveness of ideas. The Nova paper evaluates the quality, novelty, and diversity of ideas.
eval_kwargs.question: I read two papers called Chain of Ideas and Nova, and they both involve the evaluation of the characteristics of ideas, such as quality, novelty, and so on. I want to know the specific measurement aspects of these two papers.
